description: This file defines a FastAPI router for a Supabase ping endpoint, including a response schema, validation functions, and the endpoint logic to check connectivity with a Supabase database via HTTP client.

classes.name: SupabasePingResponse
classes.description: Response schema for Supabase ping connectivity check, including status, table, count, error, and metadata.

methods.name: _validate_enabled_or_404
methods.description: Checks if Supabase is enabled and properly configured; raises HTTPException 404 or 503 if not.

methods.name: supabase_ping
methods.description: Asynchronous endpoint to perform a lightweight ping to Supabase, verifying connectivity and returning status details.
